page.title: 03 An Interesting person
page.content: We decided to interview an interesting person. We chose the ticket collector on Birnbeck Pier. We went down to the pier and asked him some questions.First we asked him the age of the pier.He said that the pier was 123 years old.Queen Victoria opened the pier in 1862. There is a man at the pier who has been working there for ten years and his nick name is Jones the Toll.There is an old man who has gone to the pier for the last seven years.Jones the Toll photo copied a page of a book all about the opening of the pier. Then we asked him the length of the pier.He said it is exactly a 1,000 feet long.
